thread.title: Justine Rabon & David Meisner
thread.title_full: DriveTime reviewed by Justine Rabon & David Meisner

author: Justine Rabon & David Meisner
title: Justine Rabon & David Meisner
text: Sam Jackson was AMAZING to say the least especially considering what happened to our original purchase. He helped us with the entire process & we could not be more thrilled with our overall purchase & experience. Thank you Sam :)
